thread.title: This Two Terabyte Flash Drive Is Packing More Storage Than Your MacBook
thread.title_full: This Two Terabyte Flash Drive Is Packing More Storage Than Your MacBook

author: Andrew Liszewski
title: This Two Terabyte Flash Drive Is Packing More Storage Than Your MacBook
text:
For those eager to easily misplace two terabytes worth of photos, videos, MP3s, and other important documents, today Kingston unveiled a three-inch USB flash drive packing more storage than even a fully spec’d MacBook Pro. Advertisement 
The Kingston DataTraveler Ultimate Generation Terabyte (GT) flash drive isn’t exactly tiny, but compared to the external backup drive sitting on your desk, it’s probably considerably more pocket-friendly and easy to travel with. 
When eventually available the USB 3.0 drive will presumably arrive with an equally massive price tag, but those two terabytes of storage also come wrapped in a tough zinc-alloy metal casing that can survive sub-zero temperatures all the way down to 40 below zero, and protect your data all the way to up to a toasty 185 degrees Fahrenheit. But all that armor won’t protect a single byte of data if you lose it. Advertisement
